releaseNotes: ✅ Verified and optimized monthly shift calculations
⚡ Real-time shift updates from admin changes
🧹 Cleaned up debug code for production
🎯 Ensured consistent delay and overtime tracking
✨ Admin can now change shifts directly from Monthly Shifts table
🎯 Click-to-edit shift assignments with dropdown selection
📱 Mobile-optimized shift editing with touch-friendly interface
💾 Automatic sync with shift_assignments and monthly_shifts tables
🎨 Visual indicators showing admin-only editing capabilities
⚡ Instant feedback with success/error toast notifications
